name: Broughdancing
description:
A challenging broughlike where the only progression is your own knowledge of the game. Good luck!

Credits: 

Inspired by Cinco Paus by smestorp (itch.io) and letterclub.games📨 – Letters about game design

Art from Kenney • Home and 2D Pixel Dungeon Asset Pack by Pixel_Poem (itch.io)

Music by Lobo Loco (Wolf Schweizer-Gerth) (bandcamp.com)

Game design / putting together by me, Ezra

Made for Eggplant Game Jam #15, over the course of a week.
